verses.verse: מִזְמ֡וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm שִׁ֤ירוּ <WH7891> Shi-ru O sing לַֽיהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> shir song חָ֭דָשׁ <WH2319> Cha-dosh a new כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נִפְלָא֣וֹת <WH6381> nif-la-'ot marvellous things עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah; for he hath done הוֹשִֽׁיעָה־ <WH3467> ho-shi-'ah- hath gotten him the victory לּ֥וֹ lo יְ֝מִינ֗וֹ <WH3225> ye-mi-No, his right hand וּזְר֥וֹעַ <WH2220> u-ze-Ro-a' arm קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho. and his holy

הוֹדִ֣יעַ <WH3045> ho-Di-a' hath made known יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD יְשׁוּעָת֑וֹ <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-To; his salvation לְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei in the sight הַ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen גִּלָּ֥ה <WH1540> gil-Lah hath he openly shewed צִדְקָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6666> tzid-ka-To. his righteousness

זָ֘כַ֤ר <WH2142> za-Char He hath remembered חַסְדּ֨וֹ׀ <WH2617> chas-Do his mercy וֶֽאֱֽמוּנָתוֹ֮ <WH530> ve-'e-mu-na-To and his truth לְבֵ֪ית <WH1004> le-Veit toward the house יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <WH3478> yis-Ra-'El of Israel רָא֥וּ <WH7200> ra-'U have seen כָל־ <WH3605> chol All אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> 'af-sei- all the ends אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; of the earth אֵ֝֗ת <WH853> 'Et, יְשׁוּעַ֥ת <WH3444> ye-shu-'At the salvation אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. of our God

הָרִ֣יעוּ <WH7321> ha-Ri-'u Make a joyful noise לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; all the earth פִּצְח֖וּ <WH6476> pitz-Chu make a loud noise וְרַנְּנ֣וּ <WH7442> ve-ran-ne-Nu and rejoice וְזַמֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH2167> ve-zam-Me-ru. and sing

זַמְּר֣וּ <WH2167> zam-me-Ru Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD בְּכִנּ֑וֹר <WH3658> be-chin-Nor; with the harp בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> be-chin-Nor, with the harp וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> ve-Kol and the voice זִמְרָֽה׃ <WH2172> zim-Rah. of a psalm

בַּ֭חֲצֹ֣צְרוֹת <WH2689> ba-cha-Tzo-tze-rot With trumpets וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> ve-Kol and sound שׁוֹפָ֑ר <WH7782> sho-Far; of cornet הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ <WH7321> ha-Ri-'u, make a joyful noise לִפְנֵ֤י׀ <WH6440> lif-Nei before הַמֶּ֬לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech the King יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

יִרְעַ֣ם <WH7481> yir-'Am roar הַ֭יָּם <WH3220> Hai-yom Let the sea וּמְלֹא֑וֹ <WH4393> u-me-lo-'O; and the fulness תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל <WH8398> te-Vel, thereof the world וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> ve-Yo-she-vei and they that dwell בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

נְהָר֥וֹת <WH5104> ne-ha-Rot Let the floods יִמְחֲאוּ־ <WH4222> yim-cha-'u- clap כָ֑ף <WH3709> Chaf; [their] hands יַ֝֗חַד <WH3162> Ya-chad, together הָרִ֥ים <WH2022> ha-Rim let the hills יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH7442> ye-ran-Ne-nu. be joyful

לִֽפְֽנֵי־ <WH6440> lif-nei- Before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for בָא֮ <WH935> va for he cometh לִשְׁפֹּ֪ט <WH8199> lish-Pot to judge הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the earth יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <WH8199> yish-pot- shall he judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <WH8398> te-Vel the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> be-Tze-dek; with righteousness וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> ve-'am-Mim, and the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> be-mei-sha-Rim. with equity
